name: 300 lb container
desc: 300 lbs weight capacity and 12 ft^3 volume, such as a Chest.

name: 50 lb container
desc: 50 lbs weight capacity. and 1.6 ft^3 volume, such as Saddle Bags.

name: 35 lb container
desc: 35 lbs weight capacity and 1.2 ft^3 volume, such as a Quality Backpack.

name: 30 lb container
desc: 30 lbs weight capacity and 1 ft^3 volume, such as a Backpack.

name: 12 lb container
desc: 12 lbs weight capacity and 0.4 ft^3 volume, such as a Satchel.

name: 6 lb container
desc: 6 lbs weight capacity and 0.2 ft^3 volume, such as a Pouch.

name: Equipment
desc: Represent items a character has on their person in an easy-to-reach placement or that are being worn. This generally covers things needed in combat such as weapons

name: Off Person Stash
desc: A stash of items. For practical purposes, unlimited weight capacity and volume.
